did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Audio recordings, photographs, printed materials, publications.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection of approximately 3,000 rare and unique items documenting English and American punk and post-punk music, circa 1974-1986.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Collection of approximately 3,000 rare and unique items documenting English and American punk and post-punk music, circa 1974-1986. The collection includes original manuscripts, approximately 365 fliers and posters, approximately 1,300 fanzines, sound recordings, clothing, photographs, original art, and other ephemera. 157 books in the collection are cataloged separately.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Johan Kugelberg punk collection, #8060. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
